Object Shape: Circle, Diamond, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Estacada
There were no other sightings in Estacada on or around July 31st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsit was 1:30 late saturday early sunday morning we had just went to bed and the blindes were cracked and there was a bright enuf light it caught my eye without my contacts in so i put my glasses on and my boyfriend watched this with me there were multiple objects they were in the tree line out of my bedroom window and no they werent from cars because i live in the woods and theres no way for light from anyone that shines in.the lights changed many diffrent colors from blue to green to red to amber they moved so quik and eratic then they would dissapear.then they would reapear back in the tree line and hover then move around quiker than anything i'v ever seen.then the stationary light that was out my back bedroom window[i have 2 windows in room] was really low in the tree line an it was mostly a red light that got really bright and then would back off and lighten up and it went on for a long time.during all off this about there were multiple dogs that were barking for a long time then they just stopped,then my neighbors horn on there truck shorted out and stayed stuck on for almost an hour.my phone was on the charger all night and it only had one bar when i checked my phone at 5:30.towards the end about 4;30 there was a small diamond shape bright white light that came down and hovered my back window for less than a minute then it took off through the trees.during the middle of the lights i saw it once it was a triangled shape object that had round amber lights in each corner that had a steady path through the sky and then dissapered.i wasnt scared untill the dogs quit barking and the light hovered above my bedroom window then i got scared .and i been trying to make sense of what i saw that night and i havent gotten any other explanation i felt a little crazy for a few days trying to figure out who to tell who wont look at you like you've lost your marbles so this is my story i live in the foothills of the cascades near mt hood.
Summary: it went on for several hours shorted stuff out and it was like they knew i was watching
